'''"Tequemecan Stronghold"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tequemecan Stronghold" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] north of [[Huitztli Hill]], after defeating {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Whirling Leaves}} and {{Enemy|Swiftstep Seeker}} near the river.
